summary: A Mod Aiming to add a totally new Faction to Skyrim. Full of Voiced Characters. Questlines and Randomly generated Quests. New Armours, Weapons, Spells and Companions and much, much more. Stay Tunes For Descriptions
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim is becoming a dangerous place. war and trouble have made it 
easy for bandits, thieves and all sorts of characters to make a 
happy living murdering, extorting and terrorizing the townsfolk.

The imperials and Guards can no longer handle the influx of law breakers.

And as such over the last few years. a Guild has been forming.
Its mandate a secret, its headquarters hidden, yet its actions are known throughout the land. Like a beacon it calls.

It cries out to the bravest, the staunchest, the strongest. the fearless. the bold. Come, Fight with us.

it is not the call of honour, or the call of justice. it is 
the call of fame and wealth, the challenge of the sword and 
axes. 

Name against Name, Fame against fame.

It is not Good vs Evil. but Man vs Man.

they are Man Hunters. Killers of every Ilk.

It is the Guild of the Bounty Hunters. 

And they are Recruiting.


This Mods Primary Goal is to create a joinable faction of bounty hunters. where the player can go to the HQ or one of the branch sites and get a Bounty.

There are many, many other goals for this mod.

Here is a breakdown of the Current Targets of Bounty Hunters - Guild of Fortune

1. Create a Quest to Find and Join the BHG (Working on Currently)
2. Create The BHG HQ, A fully featured, Lorefriendly and Immersive Headquarters for the Guild. (Not Started)
4. Create a system for randomly Generated Bounties. (Not Started)
5. Create a Questline for BHG(Not Started)
5.a. Create Generic Bounty Hunter NPC\'s(Not Started)
5.b Create Fully Featured and Unique Characters that you can
earn the right to team up with. (Not Started)
5.c. Create Boss Bounties. Hand Crafted Famous Villians Dotted throughout Skyrim with Large groups of followers. (Not Started)
5.d. Create Followers of the Boss\'s and other high level Bounties, who Ambush Bounty Hunters.(Not Started) 
6. Create Small Hideouts and Resources for Bounty Hunters Throughout Skyrim where the player can gain info on a target. as well as supplies.(Not Started)
7. Custom Bounty Hunter Armour. (Not Started)
8. Custom Bounty Journal, with unique textures and Bounty Posters.(Not Started)
9. A Fame Rating(Not Started)
10. Create A Dynamic Bounty System where even the dovakiin can get targeted by Bounty Hunters. (Not Started)


Currently, This mod is Just me. 

And its my first Mod.

Development will be somewhat slow at times as im currently working full time as a VFX compositor and filmmaker for an upcoming company.

but i love skyrim. And i really am going to make this mod.

The aim of this mod is Quality over Quantity. So i will release play test files way before i release any official releases. as its my first mod i have alot to learn

please feel free to offer advice, aid, or ideas to the comments section. there is also a Forum Thread on this Mod. so anyway.

Happy Rimming People. Ill be back soon.

Current Progress: Creating The Dungeon the Opening Quest will take place.
